content.title: Good News - Early Fulfilment | VoltaGo MAX Power Bank Test Samples & Detachable Wireless Watch Charger
content.creator:
Volta Charger
February 11, 2025
content.content:
Good news, everyone!
I hope you're all doing well. Thank you for your unwavering support and love!
Early Fulfilment - YippppEEEEEE!
Our factory has resumed production, and we are on track for early fulfilment of the first batch of VoltaGo MAX Power Banks! üéâ
We‚Äôre accelerating the process to ensure early delivery. Thanks to those who reserved a spot and our loyal Volta Charger customers, we were able to pay for pre-production last year, making this early fulfilment possible.
Customs Duties and Taxes
At Volta Charger, customer satisfaction is our priority. To ensure smooth and timely delivery, we've put measures in place to ship from warehouses in the US, UK, EU (NL), AU, and HK, helping customers avoid unnecessary customs fees, taxes, and duties‚Äîespecially in the EU region.
VoltaGo MAX Test Samples
Additionally, more sample test units have arrived at our fulfilment hub! Watch the video below to see how we‚Äôre sending them out to our backers for testing.
Modular & Detachable SmartWatch Wireless Charger
I also have an exciting add-on product to share with you: a modular and detachable smartwatch wireless charger.
Video 
Watch the video below for all the info about the Modular Smart Watch Charger and the Test samples of the VoltaGo MAX.
Join the Conversation and Our Communities 
Join Discord Channel: Click Here to Join. 
Join Volta Insiders Facebook group: Click Here to Join. 
Join Volta's WhatsApp Community: Click Here to Join.
Thank you everyone. You are all amazing and looking forward to seeing how you use your VoltaGo MAX Power Bank. 
Adedayo. 
Volta Charger

comments.text: Would be nice to have a test model if any spare? Is it just an apple watch charger or will other models be available?
Backer #11 and pre order. If you want to send me one for testing I'd be delighted üòÅ
Also...I ment to ask??? On that PB that I'm backing..do you know from 100 charge and if I don't used for a year wath is the leakage of power or can hold on at least 95 percent?
Hello Samuel, Thank you for backing us and for your support. Yes, it will hold charge and does not leak power overtime when not in use.
Hi if you want send me one for texting. I'm available
Thanks for your support. We sure will keep you posted towards the end of the campaign.

comments.text: Hello VOLTA team, what about strech goals combined with gifts for the backers when achieved ?

Hello JohnZ, You will a free bundle (a 240W Max magnetic cable plus USB-C + a Carry Case + MagRing). All these items will be included in your survey (to confirm your final delivery address) and Power Bank order at the end of the campaign. All will be shipped together to you.
Thank you, Henk. We appreciate your support. You are amazing.
